game.name: Tavern Cards
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 통계, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: "Tavern Cards" is a strategic card-battling adventure! Liberate cities by defeating demons in their taverns. Build a powerful deck, face unique challenges, and unravel the mystery behind the invasion. Can you conquer the demons and save the cities?
game.shortDescriptionEn: "Tavern Cards" is a strategic card-battling adventure! Liberate cities by defeating demons in their taverns. Build a powerful deck, face unique challenges, and unravel the mystery behind the invasion. Can you conquer the demons and save the cities?

reviewHighlights.text: 스팀덱에서 게임이 하는 도중 자주 진행이 안되고 멈추는 버그가 있다. 게임이 되야 평가를 하든 말든 하죠... 그래서 일단 비추합니다.
